name: Ultima: Runes of Virtue II
description:
Ultima: Runes of Virtue II is an action-RPG game developed by Origin Systems. It came out on 17-06-1994.
Ultima: Runes of Virtue II is available on SNES.
It was produced by Dallas Snell and Masaya Kobayashi. Dana Karl Glover, Marc Schaefgen and Martin Galway scored the game.
